titleStmt.title: A Full account of a most tragycal and inhuman murther that was committed lately in Holland, at Sevenbergen, 3 hours walk off the Brill, by one Claes Wells who murthered his father, Henry Wells and his mother, with 3 brothers and one sister, and after sat the house on fire, for which he was executed, within 3 days after.

A Full account of a most tragycal and inhuman murther that was committed lately in Holland, at Sevenbergen, 3 hours walk off the Brill, by one Claes Wells who murthered his father, Henry Wells and his mother, with 3 brothers and one sister, and after sat the house on fire, for which he was executed, within 3 days after.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Edwards in Fetter-Lane,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
